Office of the Health Ombudsman telephone hours change

27 May 2019

From 1 June 2019, the Office of the Health Ombudsman (OHO) will change its telephone contact hours from 9am â€“ 5pm to 8:30am â€“ 4:30pm, excluding public holidays.

The contact number remains the same: 133 OHO (133 646).

You can also make a health service complaint online, by email us at complaints@oho.qld.gov.au or by writing to us at PO Box 13281 George Street, Brisbane Qld 4003.

complaints@oho.qld.gov.au 133 646
